title: Star Wars: Kangana and Hrithik
text:
Star Wars: Kangana and Hrithik Star Wars: Kangana and Hrithik Source : Print 
While Rangoon is set to hits theaters this week, the film's leading lady Kangana Ranaut is on a promotion spree along with co-stars Saif Ali Khan and Shahid Kapoor. Known not to mince words, several of the statements made by the Queen actress made while on her publicity rounds made headlines — be it her comments on Karan Johar practising nepotism or her affair with Hrithik Roshan. The much controversial tussle between her and her Krrish 3 co-star Hrithik Roshan, dominated the headlines in 2016. It all began when the actress hinted at Hrithik being her “silly ex” during an interview. However, the Tanu Weds Manu actress believes that their illicit affair is a thing of the past and that episode of her life is “done and dusted” for her.
